story_parts.text: A lion went to the city. He was very excited to see all the sights and sounds. He walked around for a while, taking everything in. He saw the tall buildings, the busy streets, and the people walking around. After a while, he started to get tired. He found a nice spot to sit down and rest. He watched the people for a while, then closed his eyes and fell asleep.
next_options: The lion woke up and continued to explore the city
The lion woke up and decided to go back to the zoo
story_parts.selected_option: The lion woke up and continued to explore the city

story_parts.text: The lion woke up and continued to explore the city. He walked around for a while, taking everything in. He saw the tall buildings, the busy streets, and the people walking around. He was getting tired again, so he found a spot to sit down and rest. He watched the people for a while, then closed his eyes and fell asleep.
next_options: The lion continues to explore the city and eventually finds a place to sleep for the night
The lion gets tired and decides to go back to the zoo
story_parts.selected_option: The lion continues to explore the city and eventually finds a place to sleep for the night
